title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin talks about the possibility of Kevin Durant returning to the Warriors and why this would be bad for the NBA. He looks at one All Star potentially ending up with the Knicks and why this would make them "better" for all the wrong reasons. He agrees with a Super Bowl champion who says top WRs in the NFL don't want to play with Lamar Jackson. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to discuss Durant's future and why Giannis Antetokounmpo is clearly the best player in the NBA right now. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
